help_msg:
ðŸ”§**Need some Help?**

	***!play***, to add a song to the queue.
	***!skip***, will skip the current song being played from the queue.
	***!loop***, use this to toggle a loop of the current song being played.
	***!pause***, use this to pause and unpause the song and queue whenever you want.
	***!stop***, stops the song that's playing, empties the queue, and leaves the voice channel.
	***!queue***, lists the current songs that are in the queue.
